name: The Sheriff
ability: You start knowing one evil player. You can only die if they are dead.

name: Double Agent
ability: The Demon sees you, instead of an actual Minion, as a Minion. That Minion does not receive normal starting information.

name: Sleeper
ability: You think you are an in-play Minion, but your ability malfunctions. You and that Minion do not receive normal starting information.

firstNightReminder: The Jurist points to a player. Show them their character token if they are dead or Evil, and a different token if they are alive and Good.
otherNightReminder: The Jurist points to a player. Show them their character token if they are dead or Evil, and a different token if they are alive and Good.
name: Jurist
ability: Each night, choose a player and learn their character. Good living players register falsely.

firstNightReminder: The Freelancer points to a Good character. Point to two players, one of which is that character, if it is in play.
otherNightReminder: The Freelancer points to a Good character. Point to two players, one of which is that character, if it is in play.
name: Freelancer
ability: Each night, choose a Good character. You learn that it is between 2 players. If not in play, you get arbitrary information.

firstNightReminder: The Blacklister points to a character. Show the yes/no signal for whether the nearest Evil character is the Demon.
otherNightReminder: The Blacklister points to a character. Show the yes/no signal for whether the nearest Evil character is the Demon.
name: Blacklister
ability: Each night, choose another character. You learn whether the nearest Evil player to that character is the Demon. If not in play, you get arbitrary information.

otherNightReminder: Nod yes or shake your head no for whether the Black Ops whispered the Demon today.
name: Black Ops
ability: Each night*, you learn whether you whispered the Demon today.

otherNightReminder: Show the character token of a player who was mad about being the Populist today.
name: Populist
ability: Each night*, you learn the character of a player who was mad about being the Populist today.

name: Eavesdropper
ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn something about each player you whispered today, in no particular order.

name: Diplomat
ability: Each day, you and two other players may visit the Storyteller and agree to a deal. If either player violates the deal, they become drunk until dawn.

name: Truther
ability: If you die at night, choose one character and learn all players with that character.

name: Symbologist
ability: You have three Townsfolk abilities, but one malfunctions. You also register as the two functioning Townsfolk.

firstNightReminder: Wake up one Good player, and show them the Ambassador character token.
name: Ambassador
ability: You are immune to all abilities and do not count towards the number of living players. One Good player starts knowing the Ambassador is in play.

otherNightReminder: Move the Drunk token to a player the holder whispered today. If it moved off the Libertine, wake them and show them the Libertine character.
name: Libertine
ability: You start holding a Drunk character token. Each night*, it moves to a player the holder whispered today. You think you are a Townsfolk until the Drunk token moves.

otherNightReminder: If no living player was mad about being the Activist today: choose a player. That player dies.
name: Activist
ability: Each night*, a player dies, even if you are dead, unless a living player was mad about being the Activist today.

firstNightReminder: The MAD-Man points to a player. Move the Football token to that player.
otherNightReminder: The MAD-Man points to a player. Move the Football token to that player.
name: MAD-Man
ability: Each night, choose another living player to hold the football. If the holder is executed, you drop the Bomb and lose, even if you are dead.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Demon. Point to the Sympathizer, and show them the Sympathizer character.
name: Sympathizer
ability: You think you are a Good Townsfolk and have their ability, but you are Evil. The Demon knows who you are.

firstNightReminder: The Agitprop points to a player and chooses a statement. Wake that player, show them the Mad token, and show them the statement.
otherNightReminder: The Agitprop points to a player and chooses a statement. Wake that player, show them the Mad token, and show them the statement.
name: Agitprop
ability: Each night, choose a player and a statement. That player cannot be mad that the statement is false tomorrow, or they might be executed.

name: Templar
ability: If you nominate a Good player you did not whisper today and they are executed, Evil wins.

otherNightReminder: If the Chairman has not used their ability, they either show a no signal, or point to a character. If the character is an Outsider, they swap roles and alignments with the Demon. Wake both players to inform them of their new roles and alignments.
name: Chairman
ability: Once per game at night*, choose an Outsider player: they swap roles and alignments with the Demon. [+1 Outsider]

name: Brainwasher
ability: Townsfolk might receive the incorrect character (their abilities work normally).

otherNightReminder: Choose a Comintern player: they die.
name: Comintern
ability: Each night*, a Comintern dies. If Good drops the Bomb, Good wins. If only Evil lives, Evil wins. You register as a Minion too. [Everyone is Comintern except two Good players]

otherNightReminder: The Draconis points to a character. If in play, those players die, and an Evil player becomes their character. Wake them to inform them of their new character. If not in play, choose a player: they die.
name: Draconis
ability: Each night*, choose a character: if in play, that player dies and an Evil player becomes their character. If not in play, a player dies.

otherNightReminder: Point to each player the Seclorum whispered today, and show them each player's character token. The Seclorum points to any player: they die.
name: Seclorum
ability: Each night*, you learn the character of everyone you whispered today, then choose a player: they die.

otherNightReminder: The Kabal points to a player: they die.
name: Kabal
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you win, and an Outsider was most responsible for their team losing, they switch teams and win with you. [+1 Outsider]

name: The Bomb
ability: If two players agree to drop the Bomb, they lose. Evil wins a tie.
